h2_title: Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Once down in the well, you will be able to fight the Mad Tiger. It is one of the tougher fights in the Yellow Wind Ridge and our guide has a ton of tips on how to defeat them. You can also read our full walkthrough for the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Old Rattle-Drum in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Sandgate Village Old Rattle-Drum Location'.
The content is as follows:
Once down in the well, you will be able to fight the Mad Tiger. It is one of the tougher fights in the Yellow Wind Ridge and our guide has a ton of tips on how to defeat them. You can also read our full walkthrough for the chapter.
